stickers.name: Hello World Pegasaurus
stickers.description:
Limited edition Pegasaurus. Pegasaurus is the mascot of Holopin, and it's a combination of, you guessed it, a pegasus and a dinosaur!

You will have received this badge if you were among the first users to sign up to Holopin.

The Hello World Pegasaurus is 1 of 5 badges in the Early Bird collection.

stickers.name: Early Bird Pegasaurus
stickers.description:
Super special Early Bird Pegasaurus badge. You will have received this badge if you were among the first users to sign up to Holopin!

Pegasaurus is the mascot of Holopin, and it's a combination of, you guessed it, a pegasus and a dinosaur.

This badge is part of a collection of 5 badges.

stickers.name: Hacktoberfest 2022: Registered
stickers.description: Participants that registered for Hacktoberfest 2022 are rewarded with this badge.
